places_with_reviews.name: Gotheeswaram Beach Gardens
address: O.M Road, near Abinanth Industries, Beypore, Kozhikode, Kerala 673015, India

reviews.text:
Had a great experience in Gotheeswaram Beach Gardens. The place is beautiful surrounded by nature. Full of trees and birds.

Super quiet place for having a great sleep. The rooms are big, with AC and fresh. It's just 300 meters from the beach and they offer a restaurant with ocean view.

Also is a huge place to celebrate parties or event with a nice decoration.

Really recommend to stay here. Thanks
It's a nice and serene place to spend time with friends and family.  Nearby beach adds much to its ambience. Good food and super service.
A peaceful seaside place for relaxing with friends or family. Also, suitable for small events like birthdays.
Gotheeswaram resort is near the sea.it's calm and quiet place.Resort situated in more than one acres

This was a fantastic location. Very peaceful and near to nature. The entire land is shaded by three banyan trees and more than 15 mango trees. The staff is quite pleasant and courteous. The restaurant has a beautiful sea view and a pleasant breeze. The food is fantastic.

According to the locals, this location is provided free of charge for marriage functions for those who are financially disadvantaged. This was a pretty modest gesture of kindness.

places_with_reviews.name: Jellyfish Watersports & Houseboat

reviews.text:
My entire team and I went for kayaking and canoeing and our experience was just wonderful. The mentor was so good; he really made kayaking and canoeing super fun and easy to understand the technicalities. Tuku Sir is one of the finest coach I would highly recommend. Anyone under his guidance would really love the water sports exploration.
Would definitely want to visit there again.

Very professional and safe. Proper instructions were given. Tuku made it feel safe and adventurous. Drinking tea in kayak in the middle of the river was so peaceful and refreshing. 🤘💪
I would recommend this place!

I went for Stand up paddle and had the best  experience ever. TUKU is the sweetest guide ever and very safe for first timers.  He also gives you sweets and chips in middle of the journey .Highly recommended.

Had a wonderful time at Jellyfish. The group of 15 people did rafting and kayaking. The trainers/ guides were very experienced and friendly. The equipments were in good conditions. A must do for groups looking for different experiences
The kayaking experience was just amazing. Perfect view. Serene atmosphere. Tuku helped with the activities and is a very fun guide. Definitely going to visit again.

places_with_reviews.name: Tarang Farm House
address: Kadalundy Rd, near Mannur Toddy Shop, Kozhikode, Kerala 673328, India

reviews.text:
Had an awesome experience staying at this place, the property and its premises were well maintained. Highly recommended for friends and family getogether's.
Also special mention to the caretaker Anil, who was ready to help with our needs at any point of time.

A Disastrous Experience at Tarang Farmhouse.

I cannot express my disappointment enough with our recent stay at Tarang Farmhouse. We booked this venue with high hopes to celebrate our wedding anniversary, but the entire experience turned out to be a nightmare.

Upon arrival, we were greeted with an appalling lack of cleanliness throughout the property. The showers in the bathroom were non-functional, leaving us without basic hygiene facilities. To make matters worse, we found a bed stained in one of the bedrooms, a dead rat near the swimming pool. The fridge contained remnants of the previous guest's meal, including chicken and milk, which were left to rot. The entire place was a breeding ground for disgust and discomfort, completely disregarding basic hygiene standards.

The condition of the kitchen was beyond pathetic, making it impossible for us to prepare any food comfortably. It was filthy and clearly had not been cleaned in a long time. The presence of a dead rat near the swimming pool and stains on the bed is not only disgusting but also a severe health hazard.

To add insult to injury, the care taker, who should be ensuring the safety and comfort of the guests, behaved outrageously. He blocked our exit by closing the gates and demanded payment before letting us leave. Furthermore, he insisted that we clean up all the food waste before we leave. This demand is not only unprofessional but also absurd, considering we were paying guests expecting a clean and pleasant environment.

Our attempts to seek assistance from the owner were met with extreme disappointment. After ignoring our calls and messages, the owner finally answered, only to display the utmost rudeness. His response, claiming he wasn’t running the property for money and dismissing our concerns, was not just disrespectful but also deeply unprofessional.

In light of this terrible experience, I strongly advise against considering Tarang Farmhouse for any celebrations or events. The utter lack of cleanliness, unprofessional conduct of the staff, and the owner's indifference have left us appalled. This establishment clearly does not value its customers, and I urge anyone reading this review to seek alternative venues where your special occasions will be treated with the respect and consideration they deserve.

Perfect choice for family gatherings or getaway parties. Surrounded with beautiful and scenic views of Kadalundi river.
Swimming pool, a small turf, outdoor dining along with beautiful garden makes the outdoor or yard feel more deluxe.
Pretty well furnished 4-5 rooms available.

Worst Experiences Ever! The property is not maintained and the condition is pathetic. The owner behaves very rudely and is not ready to admit the issues. Very poor cleanliness, there was bed stains in one of the bedrooms. Showers were not working in the bathrooms. Had a very bad experience staying at this place. A 100% not recommended!
Property is not well maintained. It needs a lot of maintenance work done, especially in the kitchen. The location is excellent.

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Soorya Galaxy
address: Soorya Galaxy Kozhikode-Palakkad Road Near Federal Bank Cheruvennur, Kozhikode, Kerala 673631, India

reviews.text: Large rooms compared to other hotels in kozhikodu, corridors are wider. Average price compared to city side. Their reception at the second floor.enough parking area at the ground. Neat and tidy atmosphere. A local bar at ground floor AC bar is also there. Room service takes a long time to deliver items. Wash room floor they fixed with normal floor tiles so its slippery (no grip on tiles), fell down in wash room bath area. If you are  opening a hot water valve on the shower, boiled water will reach in all other taps, so take care. Getting a taxi or uber from this place is difficult, so we have to plan the trip early. Outside the hotel, auto rikshaw is available at normal timings.

This is the most useless hotel, the behavior of the guy who works at the reception during the day is also not good, No basic ethics. I have not seen such stupid staff till date. I call for cleaning and their cleaner left with dustbin envelope in my hand, i stayed there 4 days and none came to Clean my room, such a pathetic place, really disgusting
Many smoker's are around the bar and hotel

Had gone for a seminar the hall was good the service staffs were very nice food was good, but the wash room was pathetic smelly not cleaned properly. In the evening when the bar open the ground floor is full of local drunkards.
Good stay and clean rooms

places_with_reviews.name: RIVER VIEW STAYS
address: Paruthipara Rd, Feroke, Kozhikode, Kerala 673632, India

reviews.text:
I am happy with the rooms and their service. The owner is too friendly and helpful. The calm atmosphere and the view of the river is really nice. The road to the property is very narrow and drivers need to little more careful. The property don't  have a restaurant, but don't worry they will help you in getting the food delivered to room.
I enjoyed the stay at River View and it can be recommended to others without any doubt..

Clean and beautiful rooms with amazing view. Owners are friendly and helpful to find the exact location. More over a resort its a kind of homestay. You need to take extra precautions while you driving to River view as the road is too narrow with sharp edges wall

THE BEST resort I've ever been to. Nothing less than a five start hotel room. Clean and beautiful rooms with amazing view, they also provide superfast wifi and the owner of the place is really friendly and very helpful. Had an amazing time staying there!
One of the most pleasant stays, the room was very clean and amazing river view to wake up to. The host was a super nice and was very humble.  Highly recommend to visit this beautiful place!

Had a great time here.. Affordable price and comfortable stay with the river view.. Rooms are clean and well maintained.. Management is friendly.. Well suited for bachelors, families, solo or group travelers and couples also.. There is no shops near by but the management will arrange food facilities

places_with_reviews.name: FARM FORT RESORT & CONVENTION CENTRE
address: Farook College Road, Chungam, Ramanattukara, Via, Feroke, Kozhikode, Kerala 673631, India

reviews.text: Farm Fort exceeded all my  expectations..! From the arrival moment, the staff's attention and commitment to customer satisfaction was evident. The facilities are luxurious, the rooms are spacious and well-appointed. Resort's amenities are fantastic. The scenic views from the garden add an extra touch of tranquility. Whether you are here for a relaxing getaway or a special occasion, Farm Fort is a true gem. Highly recommended for a memorable Stay with family and friends.

Everything about this resort was exceptional!! The rooms were spacious,clean, comfortable,well equipped & well maintained... Ambience was awesome with swimming pool,kids park, garden area etc.. We had a great time with family enjoying each nook & corner of the resort by playing in pool viewing the scenic beauty & taking snaps... The breakfast buffet was so delicious with huge variety of options.. Service was excellent & Mr.Mithun was so friendly and attentive & he made sure that we were more comfortable there ...
Special thanks to Mr.Prasanth for arranging everything so perfect..
I highly recommend this place to stay with family and friends.. please go for it..!!

Wonderful environment. A complete disconnect with busy life. The swimming pool and other activities inside the property are the best highlight. You can spend your entire stay within the hotel and have a great time.| Reaching the farm made were easy just 12Km from calicut airport.| Tye Ambience and infrastructure everything is top notch and the Hospitality  are very Friendly and helpful throughout,  | A definite must visit

We had a wonderful stay in the property. The hospitality, rooms, location, food... are fantastic. Great staffs with polite and good service skills. They have indoor & outdoor activities both for adults and kids. The large  swimming pool , Beautiful Garden Space, Fishing pond and many more... It was a wonderful experience.

Stay was good, rooms were neat and clean. Breakfast was good.
It could have been better if you didn't set a pool time limit. 😊 Thank you
